answers.answer: Hi!In all probability Implanaon is not suiting you. The hormonal imbalance due to this could be the cause. Please consult a gynecologist regarding this. You need to get this removed. Then rule out conditions like PCOD, diabetes, hypothyroidism. You will then need to be put on another contraceptive whose hormonal composition will suit your body. Please consult your gynecologist. Take care!

question: im using implanon a method of birth control and about 5 months ago i started my period.  i have been on my period for 5 months non stop and i dont know why it wont stop.  i have no alergies, infections, or disorders im wondering what i should do to help stop the bleeding.
title: 5 month periods?
